title: Keen: Modding has moved
content:
..to its own domain, [url=http://www.keenmodding.org/]www.keenmodding.org/[/url] [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img]
Update your bookmarks. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-rasta.gif[/img] 3D Realms: "Do you think there'll ever be a sequel to your game(s)?"
Tom Hall: "If I owned Keen, there sure would be. I don't consider that GBA game canon by any means."
